# [Interview #196: DragonCon Report - Isabel, Entry #12](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=196#12)

#### Question

Are Ogier able to Dreamwalk?

#### Robert Jordan

No Ogier cannot Dreamwalk.
